column2: "Hm... We've been walking for a while. I wonder if this is the right way."
"It's just like that idiot Xiao. If he can't be in contact, he should have at least drawn a map or something."
"Oh? Hey, it's you! What are you doing in a place like this?"
"You're with a different girl today. You have more experience than you let on."
"What? Directions to the back of this place? Just head to that direction."
"I've never really come down here, but I can somehow tell. Maybe it's a sense I have being from here."
"What was that? A native to this planet? But why could we understand it?"
"You could understand him to begin with? How could that be if ARKS have never set foot on this planet before?"
"That only leaves the possibility that it was somehow artificially created here by ARKS."
"And in ARKS, there's only one person that could be."
"I don't need to confirm this with Xiao. Luther is definitely doing something sinister here."
